What seems to be the problem with our friend Daniel today?
He's been coughing a lot, he's tired all the time, he has no appetite.
Uh-huh. Is he running a fever?
Yes, he is. It was 103.7 when I checked last.
Hmm. It could be the flu, but I'd like to see him just to be sure.
Can you bring him in this afternoon at three?
At three? Yes, I can do that.
